text: Article on social media use and caring during the #ymmfire (Fort McMurray wildfire) accepted for publication! Study was funded by @disasterCCDR . So grateful to my incredible coauthors, @DrBoulianne and @JoanneMinaker at @MacEwanU . Hope we can work together again!

Whereupon the author uses agnotology and Pascal’s wager to explain why Cliff Mass is a very dangerous weatherperson. Via @mudede #ymmfire . #abpoli #ableg #cdnpoli https://www. thestranger.com/slog/2016/05/0 6/24054552/why-cliff-mass-is-a-very-dangerous-weatherperson …
